DataElement.preferredName: Tooth Sensitivity Home Product Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An affirmative or negative response to the use by the participant of any products for sensitive teeth while at home

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)
